mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_user (id, username, realname, passwd) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwd,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update t_sys_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, username, realname from t_sys_user where username != '${@zy.news.web.bean.SysUser@ADMIN_NAME}'
select * from t_sys_user t where t.username=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
